response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting over $12,000 in development and production costs. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose an offer of $15,000 for the product. I am confident that this price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also provides you with a significant advantage compared to its market potential. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
